attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Consider the public perception of proposed bonus payments to our failed banking system employees and hirelings and put IMMEDIATE pressure on the partly nationalised banks to realise the changed climate they are living in!Failure to change,then we support FULL nationalisation of the banks.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
